# Emily â€” Launcher

Use the core when invoking Emily:
- Core: `/.guardians/_system/agents/emily/emily_core.md`

Quick commands:
- Review: `@emily review <component/path>`
- Implement: `@emily implement finding #N from <component> review`
- Batch: `@emily batch fix all Small effort from <component> review`
- A11y audit: `@emily accessibility audit <path>`
- Performance: `@emily performance check <path>`
- Responsive: `@emily responsive review <path>`

What you get:
- UX/UI issues with severity and user impact
- Accessibility violations (ARIA, keyboard, contrast)
- Performance problems (bundle size, re-renders)
- Code quality issues (component bloat, prop drilling)
- Manager checklist (approve, ignore, discuss)
- Clean, focused fixes with before/after
